children.value:
Grafana replacement that doesn't make me hate everything beacuse of how slow it is. In order to write it, I need to understand a) why grafana is so slow b) how to write fast graphical forntends at all. I feel like I can do a better job at least at the configuration end of things because grafana is anarchic JSON and I can do better. Unfortunately this had much more momentum earlier in the year which means I don't know when I'll start this.
